N

nextPlayer() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.Model
Sets the current player to the next player who is waiting to start his turn.
nextState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.Action
sets the next state of the player and/or the game
nextState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.Attack
If an alien has attacked he automatically ends its turn (there are no other available actions) Furthermore, this let's us check that if after the attack the alien has killed the last human in the spaceship then the game can end (see EndTurn class for details).
nextState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.DiscardItem
since we only get here after we have picked one too many items, the next state can only be is safe
nextState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.EndTurn
Sets the current player in waiting and calls the method to pass the turn to another one.
nextState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.Escape
We need to perform a few checks here. 1 - If after a player has escaped there's no other humans on the spaceship the game ends. 2 - If after this action all the escape hatcher are blocked all the remaining humans on the spaceship are doomed and the aliens win These two together make for a colorful method
nextState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.Move
If a player lands in a dangerous sector than he must pick a sector card, unless the player is a human and has used a sedative card.
nextState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.Noise
Since a Noise In Any Sector Card can still result in picking an Item, we need to check that the player is not holding too many items else the state changes to one where the player doesn't have to pick any more cards
nextState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.PickCard
If one is holding too many items after this action than he must use or discard one If an alien picks a sector card he cannot attack during this turn
nextState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.Spotlight
we need to check that if the player has moved before performing this action we set its next state to safe, otherwise we let it move
nextState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.UseItem
a player can use an item at any time of the game, so its state doesn't change unless the card was used because they were holding too many
Noise - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action
The Noise Action that is called when a player picks a noise in any sector card
Noise(Model, Coordinate) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.Noise
The constructor for the Noise Action
